title: Cuisine et Sante LIMA
description: Macrobiotic vegan restaurant from the Lima Cooking School opened Jan 2014 at 東京都目黒区東山3-1-6 near Ikejiri-Ohashi station (1 stop from Shibuya in Denentoshi line). For lunch offers 2 types of set menus and a curry plate. From 2-6pm is light food. Dinner is a la carte or a course meal. Also has sweets. The cooking school and a health food store are housed in the same building.
